1: וַיַּ֧עַל <sup>5927 </sup> <n>came up</n> מַלְאַךְ־ <sup>4397 </sup> <n>And an angel</n> יְהוָ֛ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הַגִּלְגָּ֖ל <sup>1537 </sup> <n>from Gilgal</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַבֹּכִ֑ים <sup>1066 </sup> <n>to Bochim</n> פ וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> אַעֲלֶ֨ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>I made you to go up</n> אֶתְכֶ֜ם <sup>853 </sup> מִמִּצְרַ֗יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>out of Egypt</n> וָאָבִ֤יא <sup>935 </sup> <n>and have brought</n> אֶתְכֶם֙ <sup>853 </sup> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>into</n> הָאָ֗רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>you unto the land</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> נִשְׁבַּ֙עְתִּי֙ <sup>7650 </sup> <n>which I sware</n> לַאֲבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>1 </sup> <n>unto your fathers</n> וָאֹמַ֕ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and I said</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אָפֵ֧ר <sup>6565 </sup> <n>break</n> בְּרִיתִ֛י <sup>1285 </sup> <n>my covenant</n> אִתְּכֶ֖ם <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>I will never</n>
2: וְאַתֶּ֗ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> תִכְרְת֤וּ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>And ye shall make</n> בְרִית֙ <sup>1285 </sup> <n>no league</n> לְיֽוֹשְׁבֵי֙ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>with the inhabitants</n> הָאָ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of this land</n> הַזֹּ֔את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> מִזְבְּחוֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>4196 </sup> <n>their altars</n> תִּתֹּצ֑וּן <sup>5422 </sup> <n>ye shall throw down</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> שְׁמַעְתֶּ֥ם <sup>8085 </sup> <n>but ye have not obeyed</n> בְּקֹלִ֖י <sup>6963 </sup> <n>my voice</n> מַה־ <sup>4100 </sup> <n>what</n> זֹּ֥את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>have ye</n> עֲשִׂיתֶֽם׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>why have ye done</n>
3: וְגַ֣ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> אָמַ֔רְתִּי <sup>559 </sup> <n>Wherefore I also said</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>I will not</n> אֲגָרֵ֥שׁ <sup>1644 </sup> <n>I will not drive them out</n> אוֹתָ֖ם <sup>853 </sup> מִפְּנֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>6440 </sup> <n>from before</n> וְהָי֤וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will become</n> לָכֶם֙ לְצִדִּ֔ים <sup>6654 </sup> <n>you but they shall be [as thorns] in your sides</n> וֵאלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>and their gods</n> יִהְי֥וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will become</n> לָכֶ֖ם לְמוֹקֵֽשׁ׃ <sup>4170 </sup> <n>shall be a snare</n>
